name: Dungeon Puppets
description:
This is a two player game.

Player 1, the hunter. Must stop the ritual that is being performed by the witch (player 2) by turning off all the candles in the map. Plays using keyboard (WASD) to walk and spacebar to shoot arrow. The hunter can shoot ghosts to kill them and shoot candles to turn them off.

Player 2, the witch. Must prevent the hunter from turning off all the candles. She can spawn ghosts with left click and plant pumpkin bombs with right click.
